de.gnwi.spicesviewer

Class UserPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.gnwi.spicesviewer.UserPreferences
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class UserPreferences
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A serializable class that preserves application and graph settings made by the user for the next start of the application. It also reads the stylesheet attached to the graph to get some necessary informations for the application.
    Author:
    Jonas Schaub
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UserPreferences(java.lang.String aStylesheet)
      Constructor: It invokes loadDefaultsFromCSS() first and then sets the not stylesheet-dependent fields to their default values.

    • Constructor Detail

      • UserPreferences

        public UserPreferences(java.lang.String aStylesheet)
        Constructor: It invokes loadDefaultsFromCSS() first and then sets the not stylesheet-dependent fields to their default values.
        Parameters:
        aStylesheet - the String representation of the '.css' file added to the Spices graph as stylesheet in the SpicesToGraphStreamModel; If its 'null' the stylesheet will be set to a default css stylesheet.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDefaultsFromCSS

        public void loadDefaultsFromCSS()
        Sets the fields of this object holding different default values according to the '.css' stylesheet in use in the application. If loading the '.css' file fails Constants.DEFAULT_CSS_STYLESHEET will be used. If any other step of reading the stylesheet fails the currently read field will be set to a default value. The loaded node size can not be higher than Constants.NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_MAX or lower than Constants.NODE_SIZE_SLIDER_MIN.

        public void setCurrentNodeShapeKey(java.lang.String aShapeKey)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the current node shape key.
        Parameters:
        aShapeKey - a GraphStream shape key from one of the enum objects defined in Constants.Shape
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aShapeKey can not be found in Constants.Shape or is 'null'

        Sets the field that determines whether the particle names should be written out in full on the graph's nodes.
        Parameters:

      • setImageFileDir

        public void setImageFileDir(java.lang.String aDirectory)
        Sets the directory where exported image files are saved.
        Parameters:
        aDirectory - the String representation of the directorie's path, where the image files should be saved
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aDirectory is 'null', is no directory, or does not exists

      • setStylesheet

        public void setStylesheet(java.lang.String aStylesheet)
        Sets the stylesheet to be added to the graph. To make some changes visible loadDefaultsFromCSS() needs to be invoked afterwards and some values reset to their defaults.
        Parameters:
        aStylesheet - the String representation of the '.css' file added to the Spices graph as stylesheet in the SpicesToGraphStreamModel; If its 'null' the stylesheet will be set to a default CSS stylesheet.
